channel.title: AllstarScape - NPC drop amount
channel.description:
I'm having an issue with figuring out how to change the amount of an item that is dropped when a NPC is killed. Also, if you know how, how can I make it always drop bones? AllstarScape does not use the npcdrop.cfg file, it uses the items2.java file.
Actually, i am sorry but i found the answer a few seconds ago. Could a mod please lock or remove this topic?
